synopsis.text:
Sugata Sanshiro, a passionate newcomer, dives headfirst into the thrilling world of Plawres, a competitive sport featuring remote-controlled robots, known as Plawrestlers, that are just 30 cm tall. With his formidable robot, Juohmaru, by his side, Sanshiro takes the Plawres scene by storm, overcoming one formidable opponent after another.

As he and his friends rise through the ranks, they quickly discover that the world of Plawres extends far beyond the wrestling ring. The technology behind these miniature powerhouses has caught the attention of both the medical and military fields, dragging Sanshiro into a series of complex conflicts.

To become the ultimate Plawres champion and conquer the challenges that lie ahead, Sanshiro must constantly refine his robot programming skills and sharpen his strategic instincts. With the unwavering support of his friends and family, Sanshiro and Juohmaru are ready to take on the world, one electrifying match at a time!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
